sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
fitting
, je ustrezno ali primerno.

seg.quote: As I was the eldest, it was fitting that I should go first.

sense.def:
A fitting
je majhen del na zunanji strani kosa opreme ali pohištva, na primer ročaj ali pipa.

Fittings
so predmeti, na primer štedilniki ali električne peči, montirani v notranjosti stavbe, ki jih lahko preselimo v drugo stavbo.

seg.quote: Make sure you know what fixtures and fittings will be left at your new home.
